title: what work has Friends star had done?
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Jennifer Aniston isn't only talented - she's also incredibly beautiful and, if reports are to be believed, one of the nicest stars in Hollywood.

Now 50, Jen came to fame in the 1990s as spoilt little rich girl Rachel Greene in Friends, who is quickly knocked into shape by the realities of living in New York.

Since then, she's become one of Hollywood's most bankable stars thanks to her canny ability to sniff out a box office smash, starring in Horrible Bosses, Cake and Marley & Me.

So just what has the twice-married Jennifer done to retain her incredible looks? She puts her trim figure down to intermittent fasting, daily yoga sessions and high-octane boxing workouts.

(Image: Getty Images)

But what has the actress done to her face?

A spokesperson for Glow by MYA explains: "I would suggest Jennifer has had anti-wrinkle injections, often referred to as Botox, to her forehead and around her eyes (crow's feet).

"This non-surgical treatment will create a smooth forehead and limit any frown or expression lines. The treatment will normally last three to six months; as muscle action gradually returns, the lines and wrinkles begin to reappear and need to be treated again.

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: Getty Images)

"This procedure can give the appearance of smoother skin if you are looking to achieve a youthful appearance, or it can be used as a preventative measure to slow the process of ageing.

"Jennifer has previously spoken openly about having a rhinoplasty (often referred to as a nose job) to correct a deviated septum in her twenties. This surgery could explain the change in Jennifer's nose but we believe she may have asked for a slender more natural bridge and tip, making it a cosmetic rhinoplasty.

(Image: WireImage)

"The result of the procedure is very natural and still in keeping with the natural proportions of her face. The cost of a rhinoplasty procedure depends on many different physiological factors, the techniques used and the surgeon performing the procedure. They typically range from £6,000 to £10,000.

(Image: Jimmy Kimmel Live)

"Jennifer's age-defying appearance may have had a little help from surgical and non-surgical procedures, although it's obvious she has amazing genes."
description: Jennifer Aniston looks incredible at the age of 50 - but has she had some help in the looks department by a surgeon or two?
